name: Fungicidal Maniacs
description:
Mouse and Keyboard
WASD to shoot

Space to Jump

Shift to run

Esc to pause

Scroll Wheel to change weapons

Controller

Start to pause

D-Pad for menus

Right Trigger to shoot

Left Trigger or L3 to run

Y or Triangle to switch weapons
